Trade/Device Name(s): VivaChek Ino Blood Glucose Monitoring System
VivaChek Ino Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): VivaChek Ino Blood Glucose Meter (Model VGM01)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VivaChek Ino Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood using amperometric detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for single patient home use to quantitatively measure glucose concentration in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, forearm, or palm to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use; control solution verifies meter and strip performance.
